Returns and Refund Policy

At IberTechSystems, customer satisfaction is our priority. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, please review our Returns and Refund Policy to understand how to initiate a return or refund.

1. Return Eligibility

To be eligible for a return, the product must meet the following conditions:

  • The product must be unused, in the original condition, and in its original packaging.
  • Products must be returned within 30 days of the delivery date.
  • Custom products, special orders, or clearance items are not eligible for returns.

2. How to Initiate a Return

If your product meets the eligibility criteria, you can initiate a return by following these steps:

  • Contact our customer service team at support@ibertechsystems.com to request a Return Authorization Number (RAN).
  • Provide your order number and a brief description of the product and reason for return.
  • Once approved, package the product securely in its original packaging and include the RAN.
  • Ship the product back to us at the provided address. You are responsible for the return shipping costs.

3. Refund Process

Upon receiving and inspecting the returned product, we will process your refund within 7-10 business days. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method used for the purchase. Please note:

  • Shipping costs are non-refundable unless the return is due to a defective or incorrect product.
  • If the product is returned in damaged condition, we reserve the right to deny the refund.

4. Exchanges

If you would like to exchange your product for another one, please follow the return process above and place a new order for the item you'd like to receive. Exchanges are subject to availability.

5. Non-Returnable Items

Unfortunately, certain items are non-returnable. These include:

  • Custom or special order products
  • Gift cards
  • Items marked as final sale or clearance

6. Damaged or Defective Products

If your product is damaged or defective upon arrival, please contact us within 7 days of receiving the product. We will arrange for a replacement or refund at no additional cost to you. To process your request, please provide photos of the damage or defect, along with your order number.

7. Refund Exceptions

We reserve the right to deny refunds or exchanges for the following reasons:

  • Products that are returned after the 30-day return window.
  • Products that have been used or damaged by the customer.
  • Products returned without the original packaging or with missing parts.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or need assistance regarding our returns and refund process, please reach out to our customer service team:

Email: support@ibertechsystems.com

Phone: +123-456-7890

© 2025 IberTechSystems. All rights reserved.
